effect.gold_silver: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
effect.crystal: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.

short_effect.gold_silver: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.
short_effect.crystal: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.
